title: [929]全球遊行進度，致世界信，幫手廣傳，比各外國手足見到 (English post)

replies.msg:
多謝 旁觀 巴打改文，改得好好
另外，我唔係組織者亦都無能力組織，只有spread 依個idea比世界，依個idea 屬於任何人，隨便用
This idea belongs to everyone in the World, please spread without asking for my permissions.

To my friends from all corners of the world,

Hong Kong is standing up against a tyranny now. We are suffering from physical and structural violence from China. Our rallies and marches were kept banned by the state police with arbitrary reasons. Our government uses mobs and triads to attack pro-democracy citizens and youngsters. The totalitarian rule of China is rejecting our freedom and rights in its "one country, two system" promise to us and oppressing us with every possible means in the hope that we will finally bend on our knee.

Hong Kong is not alone. The Tibetans and Uyghurs were already heavily and cruelly suppressed by the rulers in Beijing. Taiwan would be China's next target. After that, other places in the world would follow our fate, including cities and ports in your home country. Please don't assume this is nothing more than a remote possibility. Think of China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, and you will see how this may realize one day. China is investing more and more in other countries in the world. The Huawei 5G investment in your homeland is China's first step in holding a stake in your country's infrastructure and retrieving personal information and technological secrets from your fellow countrymen. If China can control your country's communication networks and retrieve your national secrets, China can control your entire nation, and China will control you.

China must be stopped. To this end, we would like to invite you and your friends to stand with Hong Kong and organize a march or rally in your country on 29 September, 2019 to say no to China. It is important for you to alert your own government against China's actions and investments in your country, especially on the Huawei 5G issues. You would have our heartfelt gratitude if you can also speak to your government officials in formulating policies to support Hong Kong citizens, including protection to Hongkongers and sanctions against our government officials.

We Hongkongers know that we are fighting a tough battle. Without you, our chances of winning are small. So please, my friend, join us in our fight for freedom and democracy. For Hong Kong, and for your own nation.

See you on 29 September, 2019!

Hongkongers

前文：
2019年9月29日會唔會係全球最多人遊行集會既一日？？再次震撼全球
https://lih.kg/1563910
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

我想解釋下點解九二九：
1. 首要因素：人多
要落佢面星期日一定最多人，唔夠人只會自己柒
2. 時差問題：歐美時間都慢過香港，九二九搞既話應該上九三十頭條

文宣策略

3個方法
1. 好似我之前講既，同世界宣傳中共對香港對世界做緊咩
2. 要揾人唱其他國家既國歌然後集合埋一齊（幻想下有人外國人，用廣東話唱榮光，叫你出黎支持佢地，你會唔會去）

方法2好似會快啲，好似上次美國國歌咁

3. 人數依樣野係滾雪球，如果我問你參唔參加全球反極權集會，你應該會問我參乜撚野，參你老母。但如果我同你講，有冇興趣參加全球最多人既集會遊行，成為破世界紀錄既一份子，你應該會有興趣

問題係個名如果係抗共，應該會好趕客，外國人未必會理你，應該係用啲大眾啲既字眼，例如抗極權，抗獨裁遊行集會，支持香港，大家明講緊邊個啦，等佢地對號入座

最好可以全球都搞人權法同加入美國一齊抗共
諗諗下如果連登整到個全球最多人既遊行/集會出黎都幾痴線
機會得一個，時機得一個，好好把握


有冇人識攬炒巴或者其他有號召力既人

1. 台灣
2. 瑞典 - 斯德哥爾摩 （credit: 肥糸糸大隻）
3.
4.

To my friends from all corners of the world,

Hong Kong is standing up against a tyranny now. We are suffering from physical and structural violence from China. Our rallies and marches were kept banned by the state police with arbitrary reasons. Our government uses mobs and triads to attack pro-democracy citizens and youngsters. The totalitarian rule of China is rejecting our freedom and rights in its "one country, two system" promise to us and oppressing us with every possible means in the hope that we will finally bend on our knee.

Hong Kong is not alone. The Tibetans and Uyghurs were already heavily and cruelly suppressed by the rulers in Beijing. Taiwan would be China's next target. After that, other places in the world would follow our fate, including cities and ports in your home country. Please don't assume this is nothing more than a remote possibility. Think of China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, and you will see how this may realize one day. China is investing more and more in other countries in the world. The Huawei 5G investment in your homeland is China's first step in holding a stake in your country's infrastructure and retrieving personal information and technological secrets from your fellow countrymen. If China can control your country's communication networks and retrieve your national secrets, China can control your entire nation, and China will control you.

China must be stopped. To this end, we would like to invite you and your friends to stand with Hong Kong and organize a march or rally in your country on 29 September, 2019 to say no to China. It is important for you to alert your own government against China's actions and investments in your country, especially on the Huawei 5G issues. You would have our heartfelt gratitude if you can also speak to your government officials in formulating policies to support Hong Kong citizens, including protection to Hongkongers and sanctions against our government officials.

We Hongkongers know that we are fighting a tough battle. Without you, our chances of winning are small. So please, my friend, join us in our fight for freedom and democracy. For Hong Kong, and for your own nation.

See you on 29 September, 2019!

慈禧簽果條辛丑條約 一戰果時民國繼續還

既然中共自稱滿清正統承繼人
呢張債券自然本利點都要還
唔還既佢講乜差野要用南京條約去收番香港

多謝 旁觀 巴打改文，改得好好
另外，我唔係組織者亦都無能力組織，只有spread 依個idea比世界，依個idea 屬於任何人，隨便用
This idea belongs to everyone in the World, please spread without asking for my permissions.

To my friends from all corners of the world,

Hong Kong is standing up against a tyranny now. We are suffering from physical and structural violence from China. Our rallies and marches were kept banned by the state police with arbitrary reasons. Our government uses mobs and triads to attack pro-democracy citizens and youngsters. The totalitarian rule of China is rejecting our freedom and rights in its "one country, two system" promise to us and oppressing us with every possible means in the hope that we will finally bend on our knee.

Hong Kong is not alone. The Tibetans and Uyghurs were already heavily and cruelly suppressed by the rulers in Beijing. Taiwan would be China's next target. After that, other places in the world would follow our fate, including cities and ports in your home country. Please don't assume this is nothing more than a remote possibility. Think of China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, and you will see how this may realize one day. China is investing more and more in other countries in the world. The Huawei 5G investment in your homeland is China's first step in holding a stake in your country's infrastructure and retrieving personal information and technological secrets from your fellow countrymen. If China can control your country's communication networks and retrieve your national secrets, China can control your entire nation, and China will control you.

China must be stopped. To this end, we would like to invite you and your friends to stand with Hong Kong and organize a march or rally in your country on 29 September, 2019 to say no to China. It is important for you to alert your own government against China's actions and investments in your country, especially on the Huawei 5G issues. You would have our heartfelt gratitude if you can also speak to your government officials in formulating policies to support Hong Kong citizens, including protection to Hongkongers and sanctions against our government officials.

We Hongkongers know that we are fighting a tough battle. Without you, our chances of winning are small. So please, my friend, join us in our fight for freedom and democracy. For Hong Kong, and for your own nation.

See you on 29 September, 2019!

Hongkongers

replies.msg:
Dear friends from all corners of the world,

Re: Invitation to Worldwide Protests for Freedom and Liberty

Hong Kong is standing up against a tyranny now. We are suffering from oppression and violence from China. Our rallies and marches are banned by the state police for arbitrary reasons. Our government uses mobs and triads to attack pro-democracy citizens and youngsters. The totalitarian rule of China is rejecting our freedom and rights promised under the principle of "one country, two systems" and oppressing us with every possible means in the hope that we will finally bend our knees.

Hong Kong is not alone. The Tibetans and Uyghurs were already heavily and cruelly suppressed by the rulers in Beijing. Taiwan would be China's next target. After that, other places in the world will follow our fate, including cities and ports in your home country. Please don't assume this is nothing more than a remote possibility. Think of China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, and you will see how this may realize one day. China is investing more and more in other countries in the world. The Huawei 5G investments in your homeland is China's first step in holding a stake in your country's infrastructure and retrieving personal information and technological secrets from your fellow countrymen. If China can control your country's communication networks and retrieve your national secrets, China can control your entire nation, and China will control you.

China must be stopped. To this end, we would like to invite you and your friends to stand with Hong Kong and organize a march or rally in your country on 29 September, 2019 to say no to China. It is important for you to alert your own government against China's actions and investments in your country, especially on the Huawei 5G issues. You would have our heartfelt gratitude if you can also speak to your government officials in formulating policies to support Hong Kong citizens, including protection to Hongkongers and sanctions against our government officials.

We Hongkongers know that we are fighting a tough battle. Without you, our chances of winning are small. So please, my friends, join us in our fight for freedom and democracy. For Hong Kong, and for your own nation.

FIGHT FOR FREEDOM, STAND WITH HONG KONG!

See you on the 29th!

Hongkongers

Dear friends from all corners of the world,

Re: Invitation to Worldwide Protests for Freedom and Liberty

Hong Kong is standing up against a tyranny now. We are suffering from oppression and violence from China. Our rallies and marches are banned by the state police for arbitrary reasons. Our government uses mobs and triads to attack pro-democracy citizens and youngsters. The totalitarian rule of China is rejecting our freedom and rights promised under the principle of "one country, two systems" and oppressing us with every possible means in the hope that we will finally bend the knee.

Hong Kong is not alone. The Tibetans and Uyghurs were already heavily and cruelly suppressed by the rulers in Beijing. Taiwan would be China's next target. After that, other places in the world will follow our fate, including cities and ports in your home country. Please don't assume this is nothing more than a remote possibility. Think of China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, and you will see how this may realize one day. China is investing more and more in other countries in the world. The Huawei 5G investments in your homeland are China's first step in holding a stake in your country's infrastructure and retrieving personal information and technological secrets from your fellow countrymen. If China can control your country's communication networks and retrieve your national secrets, China can control your entire nation, and China will control you.

China must be stopped. To this end, we would like to invite you and your friends to stand with Hong Kong and organize a march or rally in your country on 29 September, 2019 to say no to China. It is important for you to alert your own government against China's actions and investments in your country, especially on the Huawei 5G issues. You would have our heartfelt gratitude if you can also speak to your government officials in formulating policies to support Hong Kong citizens, including protection to Hongkongers and sanctions against our government officials.

We Hongkongers know that we are fighting a tough battle. Without you, our chances of winning are small. So please, my friends, join us in our fight for freedom and democracy. For Hong Kong, and for your own nation.

FIGHT FOR FREEDOM, STAND WITH HONG KONG!

See you on the 29th!

Hongkongers

進度係？

多謝 旁觀 巴打改文，改得好好
另外，我唔係組織者亦都無能力組織，只有spread 依個idea比世界，依個idea 屬於任何人，隨便用
This idea belongs to everyone in the World, please spread without asking for my permissions.

To my friends from all corners of the world,

Hong Kong is standing up against a tyranny now. We are suffering from physical and structural violence from China. Our rallies and marches were kept banned by the state police with arbitrary reasons. Our government uses mobs and triads to attack pro-democracy citizens and youngsters. The totalitarian rule of China is rejecting our freedom and rights in its "one country, two system" promise to us and oppressing us with every possible means in the hope that we will finally bend on our knee.

Hong Kong is not alone. The Tibetans and Uyghurs were already heavily and cruelly suppressed by the rulers in Beijing. Taiwan would be China's next target. After that, other places in the world would follow our fate, including cities and ports in your home country. Please don't assume this is nothing more than a remote possibility. Think of China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, and you will see how this may realize one day. China is investing more and more in other countries in the world. The Huawei 5G investment in your homeland is China's first step in holding a stake in your country's infrastructure and retrieving personal information and technological secrets from your fellow countrymen. If China can control your country's communication networks and retrieve your national secrets, China can control your entire nation, and China will control you.

China must be stopped. To this end, we would like to invite you and your friends to stand with Hong Kong and organize a march or rally in your country on 29 September, 2019 to say no to China. It is important for you to alert your own government against China's actions and investments in your country, especially on the Huawei 5G issues. You would have our heartfelt gratitude if you can also speak to your government officials in formulating policies to support Hong Kong citizens, including protection to Hongkongers and sanctions against our government officials.

We Hongkongers know that we are fighting a tough battle. Without you, our chances of winning are small. So please, my friend, join us in our fight for freedom and democracy. For Hong Kong, and for your own nation.

See you on 29 September, 2019!

Hongkongers
